ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Full song list from test server
ygData.msgSnippet: CHANGE CHANGE CHANGE Some of these songs are ridiculous. Level 51: - Largo s Absonant Binding - decrease AC from 16 to 18; Decrease Attack Speed between 30% to
ygData.messageBody:
CHANGE CHANGE CHANGE

Some of these songs are ridiculous.

Level 51:
- Largo's Absonant Binding -
decrease AC from 16 to 18; Decrease Attack Speed between 30% to 35%;
Decrease Movement between 52% and 61%; Decrease AGI from 45 to 50

They forgot to add INCREASE resist rate by 90%. Does anyone think this song
will EVER stick?

Level 54:
- Selo's Assonait Strane -
Decrease movement between 43% and 45%; Decrease Attack Speed for between 23%
to 25%

Um, Didn't they just give us a song that was better in every way?

Compare
===============================
Movement Debuf: 52% (Largo's Absonant Binding) vs 43% (Selo's Assonait
Strane)
Attack Speed Debuf: 30% (Largo's Absonant Binding) vs 23% (Selo's Assonait
Strane)

If they expect Largo's Absonant Binding to ever stick, why give us this
completely useless song? Is there ever a situation where we would not want
the -16 ac or -45 agi?


Level 57:
- McVaxius' Rousing X -
Increase Attack Speed for Between 21% to 22%; Strength - Unknown formula;
Increase ATK from 13 to 14; Damage shield by 8

Hmmm, I'm not level 50 yet, so I don't know how good Verses of Victory is,
but it seems like it would be a better choice.

Compare:
==============================
Attack Speed Buff: 21% (McVaxius' Rousing X) vs 25% (Verses of Victory)
Str Buff: + x (McVaxius' Rousing X) vs +30 (Verses of Victory)

Hard to judge without seeing the exact str buff of McVaxius' but if it isn't
at least 18, then it isn't competitive with VoV. Not to mention that ViV has
+20 ac and +30 agi (to balance with a rather meager 8 damage shield)

Level 58:
- Niv's Harmonic X -
Increase AC by 24

Boring? Guardian Rythmns at level 17 is +3 ac (sans drum), at level 36 is +6
ac (sans drum). I don't have figures on level 50, but we can probably
reasonably extrapolate the ac to be +9 (sans drum). Now I ask you, is +11 ac
worth giving up +30 vs magic?

Level 59:
- Solon's Charsimatic Concord -
Increase Charisma by 45

This seems a bit weak also, given that for all intensive purposes, only
bards will benefit from this in combat (most enchanters have thier cha in
the 180s-200s at level 50). Seeing as how we can't charm mobs above level 37
with no charm upgrade and there is no mez upgrade, how often will this see
play?

Level 60:
????

Are we to assume that this is being left blank to allow for expansion? Ok,
so that was probably a bit premature. I'll give them the benefit of the
doubt till the expansion is released.

Draelon Stormsong


-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Friday, March 24, 2000 3:34 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Full song list from test server


From: "Reeves, Patrick W" <pwr3@...>

Scree posted this to the Concert Hall MB:
Here are the new songs (Level 51 to 59) from the Test server. These are
probably subject to change, and will change, so don't get too put off if
some look silly =]

Numbers from X to Y means range from level 51 to 60.

Here they are:

Level 51:
- Selo's Song of Travel -
Increase movement between 66% to 75; Invisibility; See Invis; Levitate
- Largo's Absonant Binding -
decrease AC from 16 to 18; Decrease Attack Speed between 30% to 35%;
Decrease Movement between 52% and 61%; Decrease AGI from 45 to 50

Level 52:
- Nillipus' March of the Wee -
Increase AC by 10; Increase AGI by 18; Increase Absorb Damage by 12

Level 53:
- Song of Twilight -
Stun; Decrease Magic Resist from 14 to 16
- Song of Dawn -
nothing listed

Level 54:
- Vilia's Chorus of Celerity -
Increase Attack Speed by 45%
- Selo's Assonait Strane -
Decrease movement between 43% and 45%; Decrease Attack Speed for between 23%
to 25%

Level 55:
- Cantana of Replenishment -
HP - Unkown formula; Increase Mana from 12 to 13; Decrease Stame Recovery by
10

Level 56:
- Song of Highsun -
Cancel Magic + 9 levels; Stuns target for 0.0 seconds; Shadow Step
- Song of Midnight -
Fear; HP - Unknown formula; Increase Movement by 45%

Level 57:
- McVaxius' Rousing X -
Increase Attack Speed for Between 21% to 22%; Strength - Unknown formula;
Increase ATK from 13 to 14; Damage shield by 8
- Cassandra's Insipid Ditty -
Decrease Mana from 15 to 16; Decrease Int from 15 to 16; Decrease WIS from
15 to 16

Level 58:
- Jonthan's Inspiration -
Increase Attack speed for between 32% and 33%; Increase Strength from 17 to
18; Increase Absorb Damage from 17 to 18; Increase Attack (ATK) from 15 to
16
- Niv's Harmonic X -
Increase AC by 24

Level 59:
- Denon's Bereavement -
Adding 4 poison counters; Decrease HP by 30; Stuns target for 0; decrease
Magic Resist by 15
- Solon's Charsimatic Concord -
Increase Charisma by 45
